name: Atlantis Concierge Tower Room
description: Atlantis is home to Northern Nevada's only Concierge Tower — a distinction that sets it apart from every other resort in the region. Concierge Tower Rooms include exclusive access to the 25th-floor Concierge Lounge, which offers complimentary continental breakfast, afternoon hors d'oeuvres, and evening cocktails daily. All rooms in the Concierge Tower have been completely remodeled with a contemporary aesthetic, featuring 55-inch flat-screen HDTVs, Bose Wave Radio, floor-to-ceiling windows, and refrigerators. Available in king and two-queen configurations.
shortDescription: Northern Nevada's only Concierge Tower — includes 25th-floor lounge access with complimentary breakfast and cocktails.

faqs.question: What's included in Concierge Lounge access?
faqs.answer: The 25th-floor Concierge Lounge offers complimentary continental breakfast, afternoon hors d'oeuvres, and evening cocktails for all Concierge Tower guests.

faqs.question: Is the Concierge Tower unique to Atlantis?
faqs.answer: Yes. Atlantis is home to the only Concierge Tower in Northern Nevada, making it the only resort in the region to offer this level of service.

testimonials.quote: Several guests had an excellent experience at the concierge tower and highly recommend it for a more luxurious stay. The lounge is a nice touch after a long day on the course.
testimonials.author: KAYAK reviewer
